member.name: T:NReco.Csv.CsvReader
member.summary: Fast and memory efficient implementation of CSV reader (3x times faster than CsvHelper).
member.remarks: API is similar to CSVHelper CsvReader.

member.name: P:NReco.Csv.CsvReader.BufferSize
member.summary: Size of the circular buffer. Buffer size limits max length of the CSV line that can be processed.

member.name: P:NReco.Csv.CsvReader.TrimFields
member.summary: If true start/end spaces are excluded from field values (except values in quotes). True by default.

member.name: T:NReco.Csv.CsvWriter
member.summary: Fast and efficient implementation of CSV writer.
member.remarks: API is similar to CSVHelper CsvWriter class
